body:
**ATP Live Rankings**. Created by our winning sports betting model, and updated every single day. Find out the exact order of ATP players, in real time, across three surfaces. That's right, we've intentionally seperated our ratings across grass, clay and hardcourt. Let's get into it. - - - ## **ATP Live Rankings** ## **Grass** How dominant is the Djoker? What about Roger? Get the grass court rankings before Wimbledon 2021.
- - - ## **Clay** Where is Rafa after the Djoker vs Tsitsipas French Open Final?
- - - ## **Hardcourt** The most common surface, find out where the fellas rank.
- - - ### **Want more insight? Join the weekly email.** ### **We promise it's worth your time.** ### **
** - - - ## **More Tennis Resources** We have one tennis resource that you must check every day: * **[Tennis Predictions Today](https://www.betrefinery.com/tennis-betting/tennis-predictions-today)** This expert sports betting model was created by a full time sports bettor. It provides outputs for every tournament. From dodgy Challengers to Wimbledon.
title: ATP Live Rankings: Your Sports Betting Secret Weapon
seoTitle: ATP Live Rankings: Your Sports Betting Secret Weapon
description: Do you want ATP Live Rankings from a professional sports betting model? Then you're in the right place. Bet Refinery has the most accurate ATP Live Rankings on the web. Across grass, hardcourt and clay surfaces.
